TOP-QUALITY MILK THISTLE SEED - Frontier Co-op organic milk thistle seed (Silybum marianum) has a long history of use, both as a food and for its wellness benefits. LIVER HEALTH - The liver works to keep the body free of harmful substances and toxins. VERSATILE USES - Milk thistle seed can be consumed in many ways, as a tea, in capsules, as a tincture and of course in food. Use the whole seed to sprinkle on salads, sandwiches, and mix in with trail mix, or easily ground down the seed to incorporate into tea, baked goods, and smoothies.
ORIGIN/SOURCING - Used for centuries as food and for its healthful properties, milk thistle seed has a long tradition of use in herbalism. description:
Marine Sourced Collagen Peptides + Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin C
Featuring Unflavored, Non-Bovine, Hydrolyzed Fish Collagen 
With Non-Animal Source Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin C
Support for Healthy Hair, Skin, Nails, Joints and Bones*
Enzymatically Hydrolyzed Collagen Broken Down into Bioavailable Peptides
Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy
Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility
100% Gold Guarantee
Now in a Resealable Pouch for Easier Storage.
Collagen, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin C all contribute to the health and wellbeing of the musculoskeletal system. 
 
 contains all three of these ingredients to help support healthy hair, skin, nails, joints, and bones.* The unflavored powder can be quickly added to your favorite drink, providing a convenient way to add collagen to your diet.
Collagen is the primary structural protein found throughout the body and provides crucial infrastructure, both inside and out. There are many types of collagen that differ by how the molecules are assembled and where the collagen is used in your body. Our 
 powder contains both type I and type III collagen, which are 2 of the 5 main types of collagen:
: This type of collagen makes up 80 to 90% of your body’s total collagen. Because it is densely packed, type I collagen provides structure to skin, bones, tendons, and ligaments.
: Found in elastic cartilage, such as knees and shoulders, this type of collagen provides support for joints.
: This type of collagen is commonly present with Type I and is found in muscles, arteries, and organs. 
: Found in the layers of your skin, type IV collagen helps support various functions of the skin.
: This type of collagen is found in the cornea of your eyes, bones, some layers of skin, hair, and tissue of the placenta.
Our advanced collagen formula also includes two additional powerhouse ingredients – hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. Hyaluronic acid is a component of connective tissue and can provide the fluid matrix for joint lubrication, skin hydration, and repair.* Vitamin C plays a role in the production of collagen and assists in antioxidant protection.* Research suggests that regular consumption of these nutrients can provide the body with the fundamental building blocks that can help to support the health of joints, bones, skin, hair, and nails.*
 
 features non-bovine, marine-sourced collagen peptides with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. The specially processed fish collagen is enzymatically hydrolyzed (broken down) into low molecular weight component amino acid peptides in order to help ensure optimal absorption and bioavailability.*

VERSATILE USES - Onion powder is often used in place of fresh onions to prepare many meals. It’s also a great way to spice up condiments. This powder delivers a taste and aroma that is up to 10 times stronger than raw onions. Our onion powder can be used in a variety of kitchen dishes and delivers a powerful onion flavor and aroma that spices up any recipe. It's perfect for those who don't want watery eyes or don't have time to peel and chop whole onions.

"Nutrients from whole foods, exercise, and supplements are effective, non-invasive ways to support the 'three brains' interaction - optimize cognition and support a healthy mind." - Karen Jensen, ND
The Best-Sleep is designed to quiet and calm a busy mind for restful, rejuvenating sleep. It features passionflower and California poppy and is free of melatonin and valerian!
Three Brain® is a line of supplements designed to support the critical relationship between our head, heart, and gut. Together, these three "brains" influence our cognition and support a healthy mind.
The Best-Sleep® combines five natural-source ingredients that have been traditionally used by herbalists as mild sleep aids, especially in cases of restlessness or occasional sleeplessness due to everyday mental stress. The ingredients in this unique formula also have an overall analgesic effect that further promotes relaxed and restful sleep.
